Articles.Content:
Played KSP while back and I know i had SETI ctt which gave antennas to all cores and bunch of other stuff, now in seti ctt settings there is few lines for stock experiments.

Problem is i cant find anywhere legacy version of mod to copy those settings or something. So does anybody have link or something to old SETI ctt or some other solution? Thanks!
I do, but I'm unsure about uploading it...legal wise. If I am allowed to, I will upload it for you

On 5. April 2016 at 0:39 AM, phoda said:

Played KSP while back and I know i had SETI ctt which gave antennas to all cores and bunch of other stuff, now in seti ctt settings there is few lines for stock experiments.

Problem is i cant find anywhere legacy version of mod to copy those settings or something. So does anybody have link or something to old SETI ctt or some other solution? Thanks!

Old SETIctt was split into new SETIctt and new SETIrebalance. Integrated antenna to all probe cores thus became part of SETIrebalance, available from the same thread. Though a lot of other stuff was added, but it should be fairly easy to extract the configs which you like for personal use.

On 4/7/2016 at 6:39 PM, Yemo said:

Old SETIctt was split into new SETIctt and new SETIrebalance. Integrated antenna to all probe cores thus became part of SETIrebalance, available from the same thread. Though a lot of other stuff was added, but it should be fairly easy to extract the configs which you like for personal use.

I still think legacy should be available for download, also uploading to curse would be nice also as when i tried to download setictt spacedock was down

On 9.4.2016 at 9:49 AM, phoda said:

I still think legacy should be available for download, also uploading to curse would be nice also as when i tried to download setictt spacedock was down

Legacy uploads would take a lot of effort while providing little benefit. Same goes for curse. I provide(d) several mods, so even updating at one location takes quite some effort.
